title: Man Accused of Killing 5 at Wisconsin Parade Had Lengthy Police Record

title: Mourners hold candles and read names of victims at vigil in Waukesha.

content: Children between the ages of 3 and 16 were among those injured, including three sets of siblings.

title: Robert Bly, Poet Who Gave Rise to a Men’s Movement, Dies at 94
content: His most famous, and most controversial, work was “Iron John,” which made the case that American men had grown soft and feminized. It made him a cultural phenomenon.
